title: Prism of You
logline: Emergent sandbox of emotional expression within the mysterious world of the Prism.
description: Experiment with emotions in this emergent sandbox simulation by identifying, engaging, and expressing dynamic creatures known as Emoes -- all while trying to maintain balance and uncover the secrets of this mysterious alien world. Emoes are embodiments of human emotions, covering three levels of intensity of the central emotions of anger, happiness, and sadness.
